channel.title: Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Assignments
item.description: Assigned problems are from the course textbook: Bertsimas, Dimitris, and Robert Weismantel. Optimization over Integers. Belmont, MA: Dynamic Ideas, 2005. ISBN: 9780975914625. ASSN # ASSIGNMENTS DUE DATES 1 1.2, 1.7, 1.21, 1.23 Lec #3 2 2.1, 2.9, 2.15, 2.20 Lec #7 3 3.13, 3.14, 3.15, 3.19, 3.21 Lec #11 4 4.10, 4.11, 4.12, 5.8 Lec #13 (Optional) You are encouraged to work on these problems to prepare for the exam.
